name: A Rainy Day in New York
description: A young couple arrives in New York for a weekend where they are met with bad weather and a series of adventures.

review.author: hreghen
review.heading: Another Woody Allen charmer
review.reviewBody: People will tell you this isn't Woody's best film but it's still more enjoyable, intelligent and amusing than almost all films being made each year. In the same way a lesser-known Klimt painting is still a multi-million dollar masterpiece any Woody Allen film is still a class act.

keywords: new york city,infidelity,college student,boyfriend girlfriend relationship,hotel
